MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH16 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Leadervale Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:53am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:41pm on the 5th of January 2021
